metadata.name: Summer Vibes
metadata.description:
Summer is a special time for me as I am a summer baby. Taken on my 39th birthday this photo marks my last one of my 30's. It was a HOT day, we had some time to get out and enjoy a nature trail nearby. We drove to the nearby Vischer Ferry Nature & Historic Preserve to spend some time together enjoying the afternoon and head down towards the Mohawk River. I saw these pretty yellow flowers standing tall on the edge of the trail against the backdrop of these gorgeous clouds, it was a sight screaming to be captured.
